findings.Lower Thorax: Limited evaluation notable for minimal right lower lobe atelectasis. No pleural effusion.
findings.Liver: Homogeneous in signal intensity without suspicious mass. Few scattered arterially hyperenhancing foci seen, likely transient hepatic intensity differences. No ascites.
findings.Biliary: Moderately dilated intra and extrahepatic biliary ducts as well as pancreatic duct which smoothly tapers towards the ampulla, consistent with ampullary stenosis. No enhancing mass.
findings.Pancreas: Homogeneous in signal intensity without suspicious mass. No pancreatic duct dilatation.
findings.Spleen: Normal in size without suspicious mass.
findings.Kidneys: Bilateral subcentimeter renal cysts noted. Otherwise homogeneous in signal intensity without suspicious mass.
findings.Gastrointestinal Tract: Distal esophagus, stomach, visualized small and large bowel are unremarkable. No obstruction.
findings.Lymph Nodes: Retroperitoneal and mesenteric lymph nodes are nonenlarged.
